description:
A multi-piece set that’s ideal for groups of four or more. The stainless steel is robust, and the pots can be scrubbed out with sand or pebbles. Intended for ongoing hard use rather than creating delicate haute cuisine. Folks aspiring to backcountry culinary wizardry may want to consider non-stick coated pots.

  • Made of 18-8 stainless steel
  • Set includes 1, 2 and 3L pots with lids and a pot holder
  • Pots and lids have stepped bottoms to prevent warping
  • Rounded corners improve heat transfer
name: MSR Alpine 4 Pot Set
